Replace.Text: We are pleased to accept your offer of friendship.
We are not interested at this time.
Would you like to formally declare our friendship?
Wonderful.
That is unfortunate.
How dare you! All that you hold dear will turn to ash!
You have what I want, and I take what I want.
I never thought I would see the end so soon!
I never thought I would see the end so soon!
We are happy to welcome your delegation to our capital.
We politely refuse your delegation.
Will you receive our diplomatic delegation in your capital?
Excellent!
That is too bad, perhaps at a later date.
This situation is going to get worse before it gets any better.
The world needs to be aware of your transgressions (Denounces You).
We are happy to allow you to construct an embassy in our capital.
We are not interested at this time.
Will you allow us to establish an embassy in your capital?
Oh happy day!
Disappointing.
Greetings traveler. You should know that you stand in the presence of greatness!
We have a city nearby. Would you like to visit? You could attend our upcoming celebration.
By all means. It will be a pleasure to see your growing city up close.
Neither of us hails from nearby, but perhaps we should mark our homelands on each other's maps?
What do you wish of me?
(unique agenda kudo)
(unique agenda warning)
We are pleased to accept your offer of an alliance.
We are not interested at this time.
Would you like to form an alliance?
Wonderful.
That is unfortunate.
Yes, I am happy to accept this deal.
I cannot accept this deal.
Thank you. I think this will benefit each of us.
I must say, I'm a bit disappointed.
Making demands will get you nowhere.
I will comply.
You are wise in accepting my demands.
I may have to resort to other means to have my demands met!
I accept your terms for peace.
There can be no peace between us!
We are happy to open up our borders to your units.
We are not interested at this time.
My sincerest apologies! I didn't notice your city was so close.
My people need land. Who are you to say that they cannot have it?
Your people settle too close! You should consider seeking land elsewhere.
Thank you.
If you cannot respect our lands, then I will not respect you.
Apologies, we were just looking for some Barbarians to hassle.
I like marching my troops around, it shows how powerful I am if you get my drift.
Yes, you're right. I regret that I had to resort to such tactics. It won't happen again.
Hah! What makes you think I would make that kind of promise?
I hadn't realized that you laid claim to these lands. It was a simple mistake.
The mysteries of the past are free to everyone. You cannot claim them!
Though I will respect your wishes, I am disappointed that you cannot see the error of your ways.
No, no. This is for the best. You will see, I assure you.
Your troops tread too close to my borders. I hope it's just to view our picturesque countryside.
Thank you.
I should have known you'd stoop so low as to use espionage against me. Remove your spies at once!
Thank you.
I will remember this insult. You can be sure of that!
Our cultural history is not yours to plunder. It is time for you to leave our lands!
Thank you.
If you cannot respect our lands, then I will not respect you.
Your proselytizers are not welcome among my people. I must ask that you remove them immediately.
Thank you.
I assure you there will be consequences for this - if not now, then later.
I am impressed with the unique culture your people are developing.
I'm hearing talk that your people want to celebrate your rule. Nice job keeping them happy.
Your treasury is filling up quite nicely. It's always nice to have such strong income, isn't it?
I extend my heartiest congratulations on the productivity of your people.
We are true friends with the smaller civilizations. We appreciate that you recognize this fact.
The number of people living in your empire is truly impressive.
I am impressed with the depth of your scientific research.
I love a leader who is surrounded by an impressive military.
It is in combat that the true soul of a civilization is revealed. May the best man win.
I am pleased to see that the great minds of the world prefer our empire to yours.
It makes me happy that you leave the wonder building to us.
Your protection of a city-state's right to exist sets an example for all the world to follow.
The strong should protect the weak. It is good to see you agree.
I must say, the power of your airforce is not one to be trifled with. Very nice.
It is an admirable thing to look out for those who cannot look out for themselves.
These Barbarians have been a nuisance to us all. Thank you for your help!
We have only been given one earth, and I am glad that I am not the only one to respect that.
The world is ours for the taking! And take it, you have.
I see you're a like-minded individual, and must commend your government practices.
Great minds think alike, I see. There are so many uses for that technology...
Peace be to you and yours. It is heartening to see another just as pious as myself.
Yes, very good. Leave the exploring to me.
I am relieved to see that your empire poses no threat to ours.
You are not doing much to develop a strong culture. What will we have to remember about your people?
You might want to look into a few more amenities for your citizens. I don't think they are enjoying your rule.
Your empire is headed toward bankruptcy. How can you survive with debt piling up?
You tread on dangerous ground by making common cause with city-states. Leave them to us.
Your people are lazy and unworthy. If you can produce nothing, your civilization will soon be forgotten.
There are so few people living in your empire. It must be hard to get anything done.
You are not spending much time on research. How will your people keep up?
You have so few troops. Aren't you scared for your life?
Your cities are so close. Your troops are so strong. You are making me nervous!
Your recruitment of great people we coveted is becoming a real problem.
Do you not realize that we are supposed to be the preeminent builders of wonders?
Only cowards attack the small powers of the world. You are worthless to us.
Consider this a warning. Do not attack the minor powers again.
There is no glory to keeping your feet on the ground. You should really try building an airforce.
It is a deplorable thing to bully the weak.
How can you let those Barbarians run amok so close to your home?
I must tell you that your destruction of our earth is not just affecting you, but your neighbors as well.
Bountiful lands surround you! How can you ignore them?
Our ideological differences are only the beginning. I cannot approve of the way you govern your people...
Nuclear weaponry is the future! How can you not see that?
What guides you? Surely, you cannot believe in nothing. Come, show your people the light!
There is only so much to discover, and I'm afraid I cannot abide anyone who sets out ahead of my own explorers.
It is good that our relationship is built on the strength of knowing other people’s secrets.
I often wonder why you say so little. I believe you’ve nothing interesting to say.
Our poets and philosophers hold up your civilization as the light of the world, and I must agree with them.
Aspire to be a worthier example to the rest of the world! Your people will love you if you lead them to glory.
Our civilization admires the way you’re bearing your current trouble with hardiness and resolve.
Your people's "glorious age" looks a lot like gloating to me. I look forward to the day of your fall.
It is better that you lack ambition to claim land, because I believe you lack the acumen to rule what you would take.
How can you dare to claim such lands for yourself, when your people are weak and so badly led?
I agree with you—There are too many pressing problems on earth to be pinning our hopes on space.
How can you think about a future in space, when the present situation on earth should command your full attention!
Those of us with great navies can make our will felt across the world, and we are the true masters of the seas.
You must make an effort at building ships and projecting your power across the seas, or no nation will respect you.
I am pleased that you are ready to accept me as the supreme leader of this planet. Already others whisper that my time is at hand.
I see through your honeyed words and your curried favors. You seek ultimate power for yourself, and you would have the nations give it to you of their own free will.
We’ve started a tour package for your citizens who want a world-class vacation. Apparently, nothing like this exists in your civilization.
I know the world is beating a path to your tourist sites, but be warned! Our people possess blue jeans and rock music and are not afraid to use them.
How happy is the land whose ruler follows the one true religion, and protects the souls of his people!
Blasphemy and heresy spill from the lips of your subjects! You must restore your people’s souls by restoring the true religion!
Maximal freedom can come only from civilizations pursuing their own interests, wouldn’t you say?
By what right do you impose your political agenda on my sovereign civilization? I do not consent to be ruled against my will.
Your enemies know you by flame and fear. They pray to be delivered from your wrath, but the heavens are silent.
Your enemies make war on you, but you do not plunder their lands in retribution. Is it out of cowardice? Or an excess of politeness?
Good fences make good neighbors, and good defenses a peaceable kingdom. I am pleased you are content to protect your lands.
In your rush to war and conquest, you set events into motion whose course you cannot foresee. Better to stay home and protect, than go abroad and conquer.
Even after all we have done, I still worry that there are some souls that do not want to be saved.
I intend to see the salvation of your soul, whether you want it or not!
Your treasury is filling up quite nicely. It's always nice to have such strong income, isn't it?
Your empire is headed toward bankruptcy. How can you survive with debt piling up?
